fields.name: Number of new customers
fields.formula: sum(if((lookup('Participating customers','Is an active customer'))= true,1,0))

fields.name: Total amount spent
fields.formula: if(field('Discount amount per user')>0,(field('Discount amount per user')*count(field('Participating customers'))),0)

fields.name: Number of new customers
fields.formula: sum(lookup('Growth experiments launched','Number of new customers'))

rows.field_455619: Tried a new Ask Me Anything campaign for the first time. Seemed to go well.
Attempted a few more growth experiments with some promotions and discounts.
The demand for collaborations was stronger than we realized. 9 new users. Success! 🥳
We honed back a bit on the spending this month.
New marketing attempts that didn't cost much were attempted, and they seemed to work fairly well.
Hit the ground running with different tactics.
